import React from 'react' const ForecastDailyItem=({element, deleteW: deleteW })=> { const { id, city, date, time, weather, temp, clouds, humidity, pressure, wind, aqi, color } = element; var dateToJs = new Date(date); dateToJs = (dateToJs.getMonth() + 1) + '-' + dateToJs.getDate() + '-' + dateToJs.getFullYear() return (

{city}

{dateToJs} {time}

{/*

*/}

{weather}

{temp}°

{clouds}% {humidity}%

{pressure} hPa

{wind}km/h

Jakość powietrza:

{aqi}

) } const weatherIcons = { 1:'/images/clouds.png', 2:'/images/sunrise.png', 3:'/images/sunset.png', 4:'/images/humidity.png', 5:'/images/temp.webp', 6:'/images/pressure.png', 7:'/images/wind.png', } const conditionColors = { 1:'green', 2:'lightgreen', 3:'yellow', 4:'red', 5:'purple', } export default ForecastDailyItem;
